text: Smith S. Wilkinson (1824–1889) was a member of the Wisconsin State Senate. Wilkinson was born 7 December 1824 in Elbridge, New York to Shubael Wilkinson and Mahala Smith. He married Helen M. Tabor, became a lawyer and raised a family in Prairie du Lac, Wisconsin (now Milton).Israel Wilkinson, Memoirs of the Wilkinson family in America, Davis & Penniman, 1869. Page 234 Wilkinson represented the 14th District during the 1862, 1863, 1864 and 1865 sessions and at one point was President of the Senate. He was a Republican and was affiliated with the National Union Party. He died on April 9, 1889, and is buried in Adrian, Michigan. ==References== ==External links== * The Political Graveyard Category:1824 births Category:1889 deaths Category:People from Elbridge, New York Category:People from Milton, Wisconsin Category:Wisconsin state senators Category:Wisconsin Republicans Category:19th-century American politicians
title: Smith S. Wilkinson
